backup_text:
let empty = [] in 
let mylist = 3::4::5::[] in 
let mylist' = [3,4,5] in 
let length = 
# let length be the function that maps arguments list x and returns different results with different cases#
#in the case that xs is defined as a list then we acquire the legnth of the list#
fun xs ->
case xs #scrutinee#
| [] => 0
| hd::tl => 1 + length(tl)
end 
in
length([3,4])
